attributes.action: Bikes to have licenses and be fined or lose points for jumping red lights.
attributes.additional_details: Cyclists around school roads are jumping the lights when red, putting adults and children crossing the green man at risk. There have been a number of near misses and they do not show any sympathy or concern.
attributes.background: Cyclists to have the same rules as motor vehicles. When purchasing a bike, a license needs to be mandatory and road rules to be followed. Points taken, fines and loss of license if caught jumping the red lights

rejection.details: Cyclists to be licenced, registered to be on the road and have insurance: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729915
